code: var projects=[{'name':'The Gray Wolf','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator','photoshop'],'subcategory':['Infographic','Illustration, Graphic Design'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf-logotype.svg','cover':'../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/the-gray-wolf','textColor':'#444444','mainColor':'#444444','accentColor':'#906f57','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Background','text':'This visual was created for an assignment in a course in the UNC School of Media and Journalism, titled Infographics. The prompt for this project was to create an infographic with strong illustrations or visuals. I completed all of the background research on gray wolves, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other data visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Infographic','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'Olivia Rodrigo','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator','photoshop'],'subcategory':['Infographic','Illustration, Graphic Design'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/OR/OR-logotype.png','cover':'../../assets/visual/OR/OR-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/olivia-rodrigo','textColor':'black','mainColor':'#515ba8','accentColor':'#515ba8','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Background','text':'This visual was created for an assignment in a course in the UNC School of Media and Journalism, titled Infographics. The prompt for this project was to create an infographic for a pop culture related topic. I completed all of the background research on Olivia Rodrigo and her recent album, Sour, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other data visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Infographic','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/OR/OR.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'A Look Into the World of Avatar','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator','photoshop'],'subcategory':['Infographic','Illustration, Graphic Design'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/ATLA/ATLA-logotype.png','cover':'../../assets/visual/ATLA/ATLA-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/a-look-into-the-world-of-avatar','textColor':'#4d4c4e','mainColor':'#e0a885','accentColor':'#e0a885','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Background','text':'This visual was created for an assignment in a course in the UNC School of Media and Journalism, titled Infographics. The prompt for this project was to create an infographic that focused on a central diagram or process. I chose to break down the structure of the world of Avatar the Last Airbender. Avatar the Last Airbender is an animated series that aired on Nickelodeon Animation Studios in the early 2000s. I completed all of the background research on the series, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Infographic','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/ATLA/ATLA.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'Airbnb Accessibility Campaign','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator','photoshop'],'subcategory':['Visual Campaign','Illustration'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-logotype.png','cover':'../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/airbnb-accessibility-campaign','textColor':'black','mainColor':'#25698b','accentColor':'#25698b','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Overview','text':'I created this project in a visual design course at UNC Chapel Hill. We were prompted to build and design a visual campaign for an existing organization or company. I decided to create an accessibility campaign which encourages hosts on Airbnb to make their listings more accessible and inclusive. The target audience of this campaign is anyone who is already hosting or planning on hosting on Airbnb’s application. The campaign serves to streamline the process of making a space more accessible, in order to help hosts identify the steps they need to take to promote inclusivity in the Airbnb community.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'text','header':'Design Rationale','text':'I wanted to involve Airbnb’s style and branding into my campaign, in order to realistically appeal to Airbnb’s users. I utilized Airbnb’s custom font, Cereal, and the Airbnb color palette which consists of grays, blacks, whites, along with a few bright, saturated colors. Airbnb is also known for their creative illustrations, so I created a few of my own illustrations in the Airbnb style. Overall, I wanted to keep the elements concise and highly contrasted, as readability is another key aspect of making an experience accessible.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'text','header':'The Brochure','subheader':'Element 1','text':'For my first piece, the brochure, I created a simple grid layout. I implemented a clean design, similar to pages that can be found on Airbnb’s website. The illustrations serve to add a friendly and playful touch to the otherwise content-heavy, step-by-step document. This brochure would be sent to Airbnb hosts when they sign up to create a listing.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Brochure Side 1','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-Brochure-1.png','width':'100%'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Brochure Side 2','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-Brochure-2.png','width':'100%'},{'type':'text','header':'The Instagram Post','subheader':'Element 2','text':'The second piece in the campaign is a series of slides for an Instagram post. The slides contain the same information as the brochure but are more likely to reach a younger, tech-using audience. The slides utilize the same simple layout and clean design.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'The Instagram Post Mockup','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-insta.png','width':'100%'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'The Instagram Post Flat','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-insta-flat.png','width':'100%'},{'type':'text','header':'The Tote Bag','subheader':'Element 3','text':'The third piece in the campaign is a tote bag. It features a headline and illustration that ties into the same color palette as the other two campaign elements. The tote bag will be sent as a gift to those hosts who have their listings approved by Airbnb as an “Accessible Listing.”  Ideally, the bag will motivate hosts to follow the steps listed in the brochure and the Instagram post to help make Airbnb a more inclusive and accessible experience for everyone.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'The Tote Bag','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-tote.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'Kappa Theta Pi Branding','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator'],'subcategory':['Branding'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/KTP/KTP-logotype.svg','cover':'../../assets/visual/KTP/KTP-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/ktp-branding','textColor':'#2f6493','mainColor':'#69c1ed','accentColor':'#69c1ed','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Background','text':'Kappa Theta Pi is UNC Chapel Hill’s first Professional Technology Fraternity. I am a member of the founding class and Executive Board of KTP. In my role as Director of Marketing, I design the branding, logos, website, and merchandise. I also created and manage the marketing strategy and social media platforms.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Design Palette','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/KTP/KTP-Design-Palette.png','width':'100%'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Instagram','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/KTP/KTP-insta1.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'Wavelength','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator','photoshop'],'subcategory':['Infographic, Illustration, Graphic Design'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/Wavelength/Wavelength-logotype.svg','cover':'../../assets/visual/Wavelength/Wavelength-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/wavelength','textColor':'#44444c','mainColor':'#e7953f','accentColor':'#e7953f','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Background','text':'This visual was created for a graphic design course at UNC. We were prompted to make an infographic for a board game of our choice. I completed all of the background research on the game Wavelength, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other data visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Initial Sketches','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Wavelength/wavelength-sketches.png','width':'100%'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Infographic','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Wavelength/Wavelength.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'UNC Club Ultimate Poster Series','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator','photoshop'],'subcategory':['Poster Series, Graphic Design'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/UNC-ultimate/UNC-ultimate-logotype.svg','cover':'../../assets/visual/UNC-ultimate/UNC-ultimate-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/unc-club-ultimate-series','textColor':'#44444c','mainColor':'#51c4e6','accentColor':'#51c4e6','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Background','text':'Outside of academics, I play competitive ultimate frisbee. I have served as a captain for the UNC Women’s Club Ultimate Frisbee team (2021 National Champions) since Fall 2020. I created this poster series for a graphic design course and to help promote our club to potential recruits.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Poster Series','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/UNC-ultimate/UNC-ultimate-series.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'Buro Dunst','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator','photoshop'],'subcategory':['Poster, Graphic Design'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/Buro-Dunst/Buro-Dunst-logotype.svg','cover':'../../assets/visual/Buro-Dunst/Buro-Dunst-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/buro-dunst','textColor':'black','mainColor':'#f7cbaa','accentColor':'#f7cbaa','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Background','text':'This visual was created for a graphic design course at UNC. We were prompted to make an advertisement for a type foundry of our choice. I chose Buro Dunst, created by designer Christoph Dunst. I wanted to showcase a sophisticated yet modern brand, which motivated many of my design choices.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Initial Sketches','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Buro-Dunst/Buro-Dunst-sketches.png','width':'100%'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Poster Series','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Buro-Dunst/Buro-Dunst.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'Personal Branding','category':'visual-design','tools':['illustrator','photoshop'],'subcategory':['Visual Identity, Branding'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/Personal-Branding/visual-identity-logotype.svg','cover':'../../assets/visual/Personal-Branding/personal-branding-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/personal-branding','textColor':'#7e9ad8','mainColor':'#97b9e8','accentColor':'#97b9e8','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Overview','text':'This is the visual identity I created for my own personal branding to be used on my website and social media','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'Visual Identity','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Personal-Branding/visual-identity1.png','width':'100%'}]},{'name':'Trivia UI','category':'visual-design','tools':['xd','illustrator'],'subcategory':['UI Design'],'logotype':'../../assets/visual/Trivia/trivia-logotype.svg','cover':'../../assets/visual/Trivia/trivia-cover.png','id':'/visual-design/trivia-ui','textColor':'#7947e8','mainColor':'#eb628c','accentColor':'#eb628c','backgroundColor':'#f7f7f7','logotypeWidth':'210','content':[{'type':'text','header':'Overview','text':'This is the user interface design work I created for a web application called Trivia. Trivia was a project that I built using Javascript and React in a web development course at UNC. Before coding the site, I created these UI designs in Adobe XD.','emphasis':false,'align':'left'},{'type':'image','header':'Design Palette','image':'../../assets/visual/Trivia/trivia-design-palette.png','width':'70%'},{'type':'image-hover','header':'User Interface Designs','subheader':'Use cursor to zoom and pan.','image':'../../assets/visual/Trivia/Trivia.png','width':'100%'}]}];export default projects;

sourcesContent:
let projects = [
    {   
        'name': 'The Gray Wolf',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Infographic', 'Illustration, Graphic Design'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf-logotype.svg',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/the-gray-wolf',
        'textColor': '#444444',
        'mainColor': '#444444',
        'accentColor': '#906f57',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'This visual was created for an assignment in a course in the UNC School of Media and Journalism, titled Infographics. The prompt for this project was to create an infographic with strong illustrations or visuals. I completed all of the background research on gray wolves, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other data visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Infographic',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/The-Gray-Wolf/The-Gray-Wolf.png',
                'width': '100%'
            }
        ]
    },
    {   
        'name': 'Olivia Rodrigo',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Infographic', 'Illustration, Graphic Design'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/OR/OR-logotype.png',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/OR/OR-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/olivia-rodrigo',
        'textColor': 'black',
        'mainColor': '#515ba8',
        'accentColor': '#515ba8',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'This visual was created for an assignment in a course in the UNC School of Media and Journalism, titled Infographics. The prompt for this project was to create an infographic for a pop culture related topic. I completed all of the background research on Olivia Rodrigo and her recent album, Sour, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other data visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Infographic',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/OR/OR.png',
                'width': '100%'
            }
        ]
    },
    {   
        'name': 'A Look Into the World of Avatar',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Infographic', 'Illustration, Graphic Design'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/ATLA/ATLA-logotype.png',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/ATLA/ATLA-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/a-look-into-the-world-of-avatar',
        'textColor': '#4d4c4e',
        'mainColor': '#e0a885',
        'accentColor': '#e0a885',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'This visual was created for an assignment in a course in the UNC School of Media and Journalism, titled Infographics. The prompt for this project was to create an infographic that focused on a central diagram or process. I chose to break down the structure of the world of Avatar the Last Airbender. Avatar the Last Airbender is an animated series that aired on Nickelodeon Animation Studios in the early 2000s. I completed all of the background research on the series, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Infographic',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/ATLA/ATLA.png',
                'width': '100%'
            }
        ]
    },
    {   
        'name': 'Airbnb Accessibility Campaign',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Visual Campaign', 'Illustration'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-logotype.png',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/airbnb-accessibility-campaign',
        'textColor': 'black',
        'mainColor': '#25698b',
        'accentColor': '#25698b',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Overview',
                'text': 'I created this project in a visual design course at UNC Chapel Hill. We were prompted to build and design a visual campaign for an existing organization or company. I decided to create an accessibility campaign which encourages hosts on Airbnb to make their listings more accessible and inclusive. The target audience of this campaign is anyone who is already hosting or planning on hosting on Airbnb’s application. The campaign serves to streamline the process of making a space more accessible, in order to help hosts identify the steps they need to take to promote inclusivity in the Airbnb community.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Design Rationale',
                'text': 'I wanted to involve Airbnb’s style and branding into my campaign, in order to realistically appeal to Airbnb’s users. I utilized Airbnb’s custom font, Cereal, and the Airbnb color palette which consists of grays, blacks, whites, along with a few bright, saturated colors. Airbnb is also known for their creative illustrations, so I created a few of my own illustrations in the Airbnb style. Overall, I wanted to keep the elements concise and highly contrasted, as readability is another key aspect of making an experience accessible.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'The Brochure',
                'subheader': 'Element 1',
                'text': 'For my first piece, the brochure, I created a simple grid layout. I implemented a clean design, similar to pages that can be found on Airbnb’s website. The illustrations serve to add a friendly and playful touch to the otherwise content-heavy, step-by-step document. This brochure would be sent to Airbnb hosts when they sign up to create a listing.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Brochure Side 1',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-Brochure-1.png',
                'width': '100%'
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Brochure Side 2',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-Brochure-2.png',
                'width': '100%'
            },
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'The Instagram Post',
                'subheader': 'Element 2',
                'text': 'The second piece in the campaign is a series of slides for an Instagram post. The slides contain the same information as the brochure but are more likely to reach a younger, tech-using audience. The slides utilize the same simple layout and clean design.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'The Instagram Post Mockup',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-insta.png',
                'width': '100%'
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'The Instagram Post Flat',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-insta-flat.png',
                'width': '100%'
            },
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'The Tote Bag',
                'subheader': 'Element 3',
                'text': 'The third piece in the campaign is a tote bag. It features a headline and illustration that ties into the same color palette as the other two campaign elements. The tote bag will be sent as a gift to those hosts who have their listings approved by Airbnb as an “Accessible Listing.”  Ideally, the bag will motivate hosts to follow the steps listed in the brochure and the Instagram post to help make Airbnb a more inclusive and accessible experience for everyone.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'The Tote Bag',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/Airbnb/Airbnb-tote.png',
                'width': '100%'
            },

        ]
    },
    {   
        'name': 'Kappa Theta Pi Branding',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator'],
        'subcategory': ['Branding'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/KTP/KTP-logotype.svg',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/KTP/KTP-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/ktp-branding',
        'textColor': '#2f6493',
        'mainColor': '#69c1ed',
        'accentColor': '#69c1ed',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'Kappa Theta Pi is UNC Chapel Hill’s first Professional Technology Fraternity. I am a member of the founding class and Executive Board of KTP. In my role as Director of Marketing, I design the branding, logos, website, and merchandise. I also created and manage the marketing strategy and social media platforms.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Design Palette',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/KTP/KTP-Design-Palette.png',
                'width': '100%'
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Instagram',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/KTP/KTP-insta1.png',
                'width': '100%'
            }
        ]
    },
    {   
        'name': 'Wavelength',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Infographic, Illustration, Graphic Design'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/Wavelength/Wavelength-logotype.svg',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/Wavelength/Wavelength-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/wavelength',
        'textColor': '#44444c',
        'mainColor': '#e7953f',
        'accentColor': '#e7953f',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'This visual was created for a graphic design course at UNC. We were prompted to make an infographic for a board game of our choice. I completed all of the background research on the game Wavelength, and I created this infographic from scratch. All of the illustrations were hand (digitally) painted in Adobe Photoshop. The other data visualizations were constructed in Adobe Illustrator.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Initial Sketches',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/Wavelength/wavelength-sketches.png',
                'width': '100%'
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Infographic',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/Wavelength/Wavelength.png',
                'width': '100%'
            }
        ]
    },
    {   
        'name': 'UNC Club Ultimate Poster Series',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Poster Series, Graphic Design'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/UNC-ultimate/UNC-ultimate-logotype.svg',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/UNC-ultimate/UNC-ultimate-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/unc-club-ultimate-series',
        'textColor': '#44444c',
        'mainColor': '#51c4e6',
        'accentColor': '#51c4e6',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'Outside of academics, I play competitive ultimate frisbee. I have served as a captain for the UNC Women’s Club Ultimate Frisbee team (2021 National Champions) since Fall 2020. I created this poster series for a graphic design course and to help promote our club to potential recruits.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Poster Series',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
                'image': '../../assets/visual/UNC-ultimate/UNC-ultimate-series.png',
                'width': '100%'
            }
        ]
    },
    {   
        'name': 'Buro Dunst',
        'category': 'visual-design',
        'tools': ['illustrator', 'photoshop'],
        'subcategory': ['Poster, Graphic Design'],
        'logotype':'../../assets/visual/Buro-Dunst/Buro-Dunst-logotype.svg',
        'cover': '../../assets/visual/Buro-Dunst/Buro-Dunst-cover.png',
        'id': '/visual-design/buro-dunst',
        'textColor': 'black',
        'mainColor': '#f7cbaa',
        'accentColor': '#f7cbaa',
        'backgroundColor': '#f7f7f7',
        'content': [
            {
                'type': 'text',
                'header': 'Background',
                'text': 'This visual was created for a graphic design course at UNC. We were prompted to make an advertisement for a type foundry of our choice. I chose Buro Dunst, created by designer Christoph Dunst. I wanted to showcase a sophisticated yet modern brand, which motivated many of my design choices.',
                'emphasis': false,
                'align': 'left',
            },
            {
                'type': 'image-hover',
                'header': 'Initial Sketches',
                'subheader': 'Use cursor to zoom and pan.',
